name: Herbalicious Amla Reetha (Organic Shampoo)
shortDescription: Promotes long & shiny hair, nourishes scalp.
description: Unlock the power of nature with Amla Reetha Shampoo. Strengthens hair follicles, stimulates growth, and imparts a lustrous shine. Suitable for all hair types.
suitableFor: All hair types, especially thinning and dull hair.
safetyProfile: Paraben-Free, Sulfate-Free, No Synthetic Fragrances, Cruelty-Free.
proTip: For best results, leave the shampoo on your scalp for 2 minutes before rinsing to allow the Amla nutrients to penetrate deep into the roots.

name: Herbalicious Aloe Vera Soap (Organic Soap)
description: Packed with hydrating and soothing properties of aloe vera. Benefits: Hydration, soothing relief for irritated skin, and anti-aging antioxidants.
suitableFor: Dry, sensitive, and sun-damaged skin.
proTip: Use cool water when rinsing to seal in the hydration provided by the Aloe Vera.

name: Herbalicious Miracle Organic Hair Oil
description: Miracle Organic Hair Oil revitalizes hair from root to tip. Castor oil and herb-flower blend stimulates the scalp for thicker, longer, and more lustrous hair.
suitableFor: Hair fall, premature greying, and scalp dryness.
safetyProfile: Cold-Pressed, Mineral Oil Free, No Artificial Colors.
proTip: Apply the oil at night and wrap your hair in a warm towel for 15 minutes to boost absorption before sleeping.

name: Herbalicious Goat Milk Soap (Organic Soap)
description: Rich in vitamins, minerals, and lactic acid. Provides deep hydration, gentle exfoliation, and relief for eczema or psoriasis.
image: /Products/Herbalicious Goat To Be Clean(Goat Milk Soap) organic soap, Handmade Goat Milk Soap.webp
suitableFor: Eczema-prone, sensitive, and mature skin.
safetyProfile: Hypoallergenic, Lactic Acid Rich, No Synthetic Detergents.
proTip: The lactic acid in Goat Milk needs a moment to work. Massage the lather on your face for 30 seconds before rinsing for a brighter complexion.

name: Herbalicious Honey & Oats Soap
description: A soothing blend of honey and oats for gentle exfoliation and deep moisture. Perfect for dry skin.
image: /Products/Herbalicious Honey I’m Home (Honey and Oats Soap) Organic Soap, Handmade Honey Oats Soap.webp
suitableFor: Dry, flaky skin needing gentle exfoliation.
proTip: This soap is excellent as a 'body mask'. Apply to rough areas like elbows and let it sit while you finish your shower routine.

name: Herbalicious Charcoal Soap (Organic Soap)
description: Activated charcoal draws out dirt and oil. Regulates sebum and provides gentle exfoliation for acne-prone skin.
suitableFor: Oily, acne-prone skin and urban residents exposed to pollution.
proTip: Ideal for after-gym showers to pull out sweat-induced toxins and prevent breakouts.

name: Vitamin C Serum for Brightening
description: Infused with Vitamin C for skin brightening and hydration. Reduces dark spots and promotes even skin tone.
suitableFor: Hyperpigmentation, dullness, and early signs of aging.
proTip: Always follow with SPF during the day, as Vitamin C and sun protection work together to fight UV damage.

name: Pure Moringa Powder
description: Organic pure moringa powder for energy and immunity boost. Rich in antioxidants and essential nutrients.
suitableFor: Boosting immunity, energy recovery, and nutritional support.
proTip: Add to your morning green smoothie or mix with honey for a quick, natural energy lift.

name: Natural Magnesium Spray
shortDescription: Topical magnesium for sleep and stress.
description: A direct way to replenish magnesium levels. Helps with muscle relaxation, sleep quality, and stress reduction.
suitableFor: Insomnia, leg cramps, anxiety, and post-workout recovery.
proTip: Spray on the soles of your feet 20 minutes before bed. This is the fastest way for magnesium to enter your system.

name: Herbalicious Hibiscus Shampoo
description: Enriched with Hibiscus extracts to prevent premature graying and boost hair volume. Provides a cooling sensation for the scalp.
suitableFor: Thinning hair, premature graying, and heated scalps.
proTip: Massage into scalp for 3 minutes to stimulate blood flow.

name: Handmade Calendula Soap
shortDescription: Healing and gentle for delicate skin.
description: Infused with healing Calendula petals. Known for its anti-inflammatory and antiseptic properties, perfect for sensitive or irritated skin.
suitableFor: Sensitive skin, diaper rash prone skin, and minor cuts.
proTip: Excellent for washing baby's clothes or skin due to its mildness.

name: Coconut Soap with Castor Oil
description: A rich lathering soap that deep cleanses while moisturizing. Castor oil ensures skin remains soft and supple.
suitableFor: All skin types, especially rough skin.
proTip: Great for shaving due to its thick, creamy lather.

name: Lemon & Tangerine Soap
shortDescription: Energizing citrus burst for dull skin.
description: A refreshing blend of Lemon and Tangerine essential oils. Brightens dull skin and uplifts your mood with every wash.
suitableFor: Oily skin, dull complexion, and morning showers.
proTip: Use in the morning for an instant wake-up call for your skin and senses.

name: Nourishing Body Butter
description: A luxurious, thick body butter that heals cracked skin and locks in moisture for 24 hours. Infused with the royal scent of Frankincense.
image: /Products/Handmade Nourishing Body Butter with Frankincense & Calendula.webp
suitableFor: Very dry skin, cracked heels, and elbows.
proTip: Apply immediately after a shower while skin is still damp to seal in moisture.

name: Pink Himalayan Salt Soap
description: Packed with 84 trace minerals from Himalayan Pink Salt. Exfoliates dead skin cells and detoxifies the body.
suitableFor: Body acne, rough skin texture.
proTip: Rub the bar directly on your skin for a spa-like salt scrub massage.

name: Turmeric & Papaya Soap
description: The dynamic duo of Turmeric and Papaya targets glowing skin. Papaya enzymes gently exfoliate while Turmeric fights inflammation.
suitableFor: Dark spots, uneven skin tone, and acne scars.
proTip: Leave the lather on pigmented areas for 60 seconds before washing off.

name: Eucalpyt-Ease Wash (Eucalyptus Soap)
description: A cooling soap that helps clear nasal congestion and relaxes soothing muscles. Perfect after a long day.
image: /Products/Herbalicious Eucalpyt-Ease Wash(Eucalyptus Soap) organic soap, Handmade Eucalyptus Soap.webp
suitableFor: Post-workout, cold/flu season, and fatigue.
proTip: Inhale the steam while showering with this soap to help clear sinuses.

name: Herbalicious Hair Serum
description: A lightweight, non-greasy formula that tames frizz, adds shine, and protects hair from heat damage.
suitableFor: Frizzy, dry, and unmanageable hair.
proTip: Apply to damp ends before blow-drying for a professional salon finish.

name: Hibis-Scrub (Hibiscus Soap)
description: Known as the 'Botox plant', Hibiscus helps firm the skin and improve elasticity. Provides a gentle floral cleanse.
image: /Products/Herbalicious Hibis-Scrub(Hibiscus Soap) Organic Soap, Handmade Hibiscus Soap.webp
suitableFor: Aging skin, loose skin.
proTip: Use consistently for firmer looking skin over time.

name: Herbalicious Hydrating Balm
description: A pocket-sized miracle for dry patches, lips, and cuticles. Instantly relieves dryness anywhere on the body.
suitableFor: Chapped lips, dry cuticles, rough knees.
proTip: Keep in your bag for on-the-go hydration emergencies.

name: Turmeric Tingle (Turmeric & Tea Tree)
description: A potent combination of Turmeric and Tea Tree to fight acne-causing bacteria and reduce inflammation.
image: /Products/Herbalicious Turmeric Tingle(Turmeric Soap) Organic Soap, Handmade Turmeric & Tea Tree Soap.webp
suitableFor: Active acne, cystic acne.
proTip: Spot wash acne-prone areas twice daily for best results.

name: Makhana & Coconut Powder
description: A traditional power blend of Fox Nuts (Makhana) and Coconut. Supports bone health and provides sustained energy.
suitableFor: Post-partum recovery, growing kids, seniors.
proTip: Mix into warm milk for a nutritious night-cap.

name: Tulsi Organic Soap
description: Basil (Tulsi) is revered for its purifying properties. Cleanses the skin of impurities and protects against fungal infections.
suitableFor: Fungal infections, itchiness, body acne.
proTip: Great for sweaty summer days to keep skin fresh and infection-free.

name: Strawberry Lip Balm
description: A sweet, hydrating treat for your lips. Made with real strawberry extracts and organic beeswax.
suitableFor: Dry, dark lips.
proTip: Apply under matte lipstick to prevent drying.
